definition: to bleed/bleeding/(fig.) to spend money in large amounts

to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc

pinyin: chu1 xue4 xing4 deng1 ge2 re4

sentences.english: Her arms showed green patches, indicating heavy internal bleeding.
sentences.chinese: 她的胳膊出現了青斑，表明有嚴重的內出血。

sentences.english: Spontanous subarachnoid hemorrhage ( SAH) mostly arises from rupture and bleeding of intracranial aneurysms.
sentences.chinese: 自發性蛛網膜下腔出血多是由於顱內動脈瘤破裂引起。

sentences.english: Objective To study the clinical features and treatment of traumatic cerebral intraventricular hemorrhage(TIVH).
sentences.chinese: 目的探討外傷性腦室出血的臨牀特點和治療方法。

sentences.english: The child lived but had major medical problems including oxygen deprivation and bleeding in the brain.
sentences.chinese: 小孩存活了下來，但患有缺氧及腦出血等嚴重病症。

sentences.english: Objective To study the emergency rescue of basicranial fracture complicated with massive hemorrhage.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討顱底骨折並鼻腔大出血的急診治療措施。

sentences.english: Objective To study the surgical treatment in massive hemorrhage of gastroduodenal ulcer.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討胃十二指腸潰瘍大出血的外科治療。

sentences.english: They find Jamey on the ground, bleeding from her left wrist.
sentences.chinese: 在房間裏，他們發現傑米倒在地上，左手腕大量出血。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate clinical characteristic of alimentary tract hemorrhage caused by ancylostomiasis .
sentences.chinese: 目的探討鉤蟲感染導致消化道出血的臨牀特點。

sentences.english: Postoperative hemorrhage was main side effect for conization.
sentences.chinese: 宮頸錐切術主要的併發症是術後出血。

sentences.english: May potentiate oral anticoagulants, others that prolong bleeding.
sentences.chinese: 口服抗凝血劑，會增強，也有人認爲延長出血。

sentences.english: Bleed photos off the edge of the page.
sentences.chinese: 出血的照片就可以超出頁邊。

sentences.english: Empty of lienal kidney all, break its to shut Tibetan all to photograph, reason sees pregnancy bleeds.
sentences.chinese: 脾腎俱虛，則失其閉藏統攝，故見孕期出血。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the hemostatic effect of gelatin fleece (GF) on different traumatic bleeding.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討明膠纖維網在不同出血創面的止血效果。

sentences.english: But bleeding-heart arguments don't necessarily tell heads of state to move their money.
sentences.chinese: 但是，出血，心論據並不一定告訴元首將他們的錢。

sentences.english: One driver was blooding and another was shut in the taxi.
sentences.chinese: 一位司機出血，另一位在出租車。

sentences.english: Objective To study the diagnostic method and bleeding mechanism of the hemorrhagic moyamoya disease.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究出血性煙霧病的出血機制及檢查診斷方法。

definition: hematoma/swelling of soft tissue due to internal hemorrhage
